articles.title: Madonna Reveals New Dance Album Coming Next Year as She Returns to Warner Records - Variety
articles.description: Madonna is returning to the dancefloor with a new dance record as she resigns with Warner Records.
articles.content:
Madonna is getting back into the groove.
The Queen of Pop revealed on Thursday that she will release a brand new dance album in 2026, and has resigned with Warner Records nearly two decades after de… [+1479 chars]

articles.title: Who was Celeste Rivas, the missing teen found dead in singer d4vd’s Tesla? - Al Jazeera
articles.description: The LAPD identified the body of a girl in the car of Romantic Homicide singer d4vd. She went missing in 2024, aged 13.
articles.content: A decomposing body found in the boot of American singer d4vds impounded Tesla by police on September 8 was identified by the Los Angeles Police Department (LAPD) as missing California teenager Celest… [+3371 chars]
